descr: "A record of a clinical assessment performed to determine what problem(s) may affect the patient and before planning the treatments or management strategies that are best to manage a patient's condition. Assessments are often 1:1 with a clinical consultation / encounter,  but this varies greatly depending on the clinical workflow. This resource is called \"ClinicalImpression\" rather than \"ClinicalAssessment\" to avoid confusion with the recording of assessment tools such as Apgar score."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a ClinicalImpression resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "A unique identifier assigned to the clinical impression that remains consistent regardless of what server the impression is stored on."

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "Identifies the workflow status of the assessment."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: code
fields.descr: "Categorizes the type of clinical assessment performed."

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "A summary of the context and/or cause of the assessment - why / where was it performed, and what patient events/status prompted it."

fields.name: _description
fields.descr: "Extensions for description"

fields.name: subject
fields.descr: "The patient or group of individuals assessed as part of this record."

fields.name: context
fields.descr: "The encounter or episode of care this impression was created as part of."

fields.name: effectiveDateTime
fields.descr: "The point in time or period over which the subject was assessed."

fields.name: _effectiveDateTime
fields.descr: "Extensions for effectiveDateTime"

fields.name: effectivePeriod
fields.descr: "The point in time or period over which the subject was assessed."

fields.name: date
fields.descr: "Indicates when the documentation of the assessment was complete."

fields.name: _date
fields.descr: "Extensions for date"

fields.name: assessor
fields.descr: "The clinician performing the assessment."

fields.name: previous
fields.descr: "A reference to the last assesment that was conducted bon this patient. Assessments are often/usually ongoing in nature; a care provider (practitioner or team) will make new assessments on an ongoing basis as new data arises or the patient's conditions changes."

fields.name: problem
fields.descr: "This a list of the relevant problems/conditions for a patient."

fields.name: investigation
fields.descr: "One or more sets of investigations (signs, symptions, etc.). The actual grouping of investigations vary greatly depending on the type and context of the assessment. These investigations may include data generated during the assessment process, or data previously generated and recorded that is pertinent to the outcomes."

fields.name: protocol
fields.descr: "Reference to a specific published clinical protocol that was followed during this assessment, and/or that provides evidence in support of the diagnosis."

fields.name: _protocol
fields.descr: "Extensions for protocol"

fields.name: summary
fields.descr: "A text summary of the investigations and the diagnosis."

fields.name: _summary
fields.descr: "Extensions for summary"

fields.name: finding
fields.descr: "Specific findings or diagnoses that was considered likely or relevant to ongoing treatment."

fields.name: prognosisCodeableConcept
fields.descr: "Estimate of likely outcome."

fields.name: prognosisReference
fields.descr: "RiskAssessment expressing likely outcome."

fields.name: action
fields.descr: "Action taken as part of assessment procedure."

fields.name: note
fields.descr: "Commentary about the impression, typically recorded after the impression itself was made, though supplemental notes by the original author could also appear."
